verses.verse: And as for me<WH259>, in the first year<WH8141> of Darius<WH1867> the Mede<WH4075>, I stood<WH5977> up to confirm<WH2388> and strengthen him<WH4581>.

And now will I show<WH5046> thee the truth<WH571>. Behold<WH5975>, there shall stand up yet three<WH7969> kings<WH4428> in Persia<WH6539>; and the fourth<WH7243> shall be far<WH6239> richer<WH6238> than they all<WH1419>: and when he is waxed strong<WH2393> through his riches<WH6239>, he shall stir up<WH5782> all against the realm<WH4438> of Greece<WH3120>.
And a mighty<WH1368> king<WH4428> shall stand up<WH5975>, that shall rule<WH4910> with great<WH7227> dominion<WH4474>, and do<WH6213> according to his will<WH7522>.

And when he shall stand up<WH5975>, his kingdom<WH4438> shall be broken<WH7665>, and shall be divided<WH2673> toward the four<WH702> winds<WH7307> of heaven<WH8064>, but not to his posterity<WH319>, nor according to his dominion<WH4915> wherewith he ruled<WH4910>; for his kingdom<WH4438> shall be plucked up<WH5428>, even for others besides these<WH312>.

And the king<WH4428> of the south<WH5045> shall be strong<WH2388>, and one of his princes<WH8269>; and he shall be strong<WH2388> above him<WH4910>, and have dominion; his dominion<WH4475> shall be a great<WH7227> dominion<WH4474>.

And at the end<WH7093> of years<WH8141> they shall join themselves together<WH2266>; and the daughter<WH1323> of the king<WH4428> of the south<WH5045> shall come<WH935> to the king<WH4428> of the north<WH6828> to make<WH6213> an agreement<WH4339>: but she shall not retain<WH6113> the strength<WH3581> of her arm<WH2220>; neither shall he stand<WH5975>, nor his arm<WH2220>; but she shall be given up<WH5414>, and they that brought<WH935> her<WH3205>, and he that begat her<WH2388>, and he that strengthened her in those times<WH6256>.

But out of a shoot<WH5342> from her roots<WH8328> shall one stand up<WH5975> in his place<WH3653>, who shall come<WH935> unto the army<WH2428>, and shall enter<WH935> into the fortress<WH4581> of the king<WH4428> of the north<WH6828>, and shall deal<WH6213> against them<WH2388>, and shall prevail.

And also their gods<WH430>, with their molten images<WH5257>, and with their goodly<WH2532> vessels<WH3627> of silver<WH3701> and of gold<WH2091>, shall he carry<WH935> captive<WH7628> into Egypt<WH4714>; and he shall refrain<WH5975> some years<WH8141> from the king<WH4428> of the north<WH6828>.
And he shall come<WH935> into the realm<WH4438> of the king<WH4428> of the south<WH5045>, but he shall return<WH7725> into his own land<WH127>.

And his sons<WH1121> shall war<WH1624>, and shall assemble<WH622> a multitude<WH1995> of great<WH7227> forces<WH2428>, which shall<WH935> come<WH935> on<WH7857>, and overflow, and pass through<WH5674>; and they shall return<WH7725> and war<WH1624>, even to his fortress<WH4581>.

And the king<WH4428> of the south<WH5045> shall be moved with anger<WH4843>, and shall come forth<WH3318> and fight<WH3898> with him<WH4428>, even with the king of the north<WH6828>; and he shall set forth<WH5975> a great<WH7227> multitude<WH1995>, and the multitude<WH1995> shall be given<WH5414> into his hand<WH3027>.
And the multitude<WH1995> shall be lifted up<WH7311>, and his heart<WH3824> shall be exalted<WH7311>; and he shall cast down<WH5307> tens of thousands<WH7239>, but he shall not prevail<WH5810>.

And the king<WH4428> of the north<WH6828> shall return<WH7725>, and shall set forth<WH5975> a multitude<WH1995> greater<WH7227> than the former<WH7223>; and he shall<WH935> come<WH935> on at the end<WH7093> of the times<WH6256>, even of years<WH8141>, with a great<WH7227> army<WH2428> and with much<WH7227> substance<WH7399>.

And in those times<WH6256> there shall many<WH7227> stand up<WH5975> against the king<WH4428> of the south<WH5045>: also the children of the violent<WH1121> among thy people<WH5971> shall lift<WH5375> themselves up to establish<WH5975> the vision<WH2377>; but they shall fall<WH3782>.

So the king<WH4428> of the north<WH6828> shall come<WH935>, and cast up<WH8210> a mound<WH5550>, and take<WH3920> a well-fortified<WH4013> city<WH5892>: and the forces<WH2220> of the south<WH5045> shall not stand<WH5975>, neither his chosen<WH4005> people<WH5971>, neither shall there be any strength<WH3581> to stand<WH5975>.

But he that cometh<WH935> against him shall do<WH6213> according to his own will<WH7522>, and none shall stand<WH5975> before<WH6440> him<WH5975>; and he shall stand in the glorious<WH6643> land<WH776>, and in his hand<WH3027> shall be destruction<WH3617>.

And he shall set<WH7760> his face<WH6440> to come<WH935> with the strength<WH8633> of his whole kingdom<WH4438>, and with him equitable<WH3477> conditions<WH6213>; and he shall perform them<WH5414>: and he shall give him the daughter<WH1323> of women<WH802>, to corrupt<WH7843> her<WH5975>; but she shall not stand, neither be for him.

After this shall he turn<WH7760> his face<WH6440> unto the isles<WH339>, and shall take<WH3920> many<WH7227>: but a prince<WH7101> shall cause the reproach<WH2781> offered by him to cease<WH7673>; yea<WH1115>, moreover, he shall cause his reproach<WH2781> to turn upon him<WH7725>.
Then he shall turn<WH7725> his face<WH6440> toward the fortresses<WH4581> of his own land<WH776>; but he shall stumble<WH3782> and fall<WH5307>, and shall not be found<WH4672>.

Then shall stand up<WH5975> in his place<WH3653> one<WH5674> that shall cause an exactor<WH5065> to pass through the glory<WH1925> of the kingdom<WH4438>; but within few<WH259> days<WH3117> he shall be destroyed<WH7665>, neither in anger<WH639>, nor in battle<WH4421>.

And in his place<WH3653> shall stand up<WH5975> a contemptible person<WH959>, to whom they had not given<WH5414> the honor<WH1935> of the kingdom<WH4438>: but he shall come<WH935> in time of security<WH7962>, and shall obtain<WH2388> the kingdom<WH4438> by flatteries<WH2519>.
And the overwhelming<WH7858> forces<WH2220> shall be overwhelmed<WH7857> from before<WH6440> him<WH7665>, and shall be broken; yea<WH5057>, also the prince of the covenant<WH1285>.
And after the league<WH2266> made with him he shall work<WH6213> deceitfully<WH4820>; for he shall come up<WH5927>, and shall become strong<WH6105>, with a small<WH4592> people<WH1471>.

In time of security<WH7962> shall he come<WH935> even upon the fattest places<WH4924> of the province<WH4082>; and he shall do<WH6213> that which his fathers<WH1> have not done<WH6213>, nor his fathers<WH1>' fathers<WH1>; he shall scatter<WH967> among them prey<WH961>, and spoil<WH7998>, and substance<WH7399>: yea<WH2803>, he shall devise his devices<WH4284> against the strongholds<WH4013>, even for a time<WH6256>.

And he shall stir up<WH5782> his power<WH3581> and his courage<WH3824> against the king<WH4428> of the south<WH5045> with a great<WH1419> army<WH2428>; and the king<WH4428> of the south<WH5045> shall war<WH1624> in battle<WH4421> with an exceeding<WH3966> great<WH1419> and mighty<WH6099> army<WH2428>; but he shall not stand<WH5975>; for they shall devise<WH2803> devices against him<WH4284>.
Yea <WH398>, they that eat of his dainties<WH6598> shall destroy<WH7665> him<WH2428>, and his army shall overflow<WH7857>; and many<WH7227> shall fall<WH5307> down slain<WH2491>.

And as for both<WH8147> these kings<WH4428>, their hearts<WH3824> shall be to do mischief<WH4827>, and they shall speak<WH1696> lies<WH3577> at one<WH259> table<WH7979>: but it shall not prosper<WH6743>; for yet the end<WH7093> shall be at the time appointed<WH4150>.

Then shall he return<WH7725> into his land<WH776> with great<WH1419> substance<WH7399>; and his heart<WH3824> shall be against the holy<WH6944> covenant<WH1285>; and he shall do<WH6213> his pleasure<WH7725>, and return to his own land<WH776>.
At the time appointed<WH4150> he shall return<WH7725>, and come<WH935> into the south<WH5045>; but it shall not be in the latter<WH314> time as it was in the former<WH7223>.

For ships<WH6716> of Kittim<WH3794> shall come<WH935> against him<WH3512>; therefore he shall be grieved, and shall return<WH7725>, and have indignation<WH2194> against the holy<WH6944> covenant<WH1285>, and shall do<WH6213> his pleasure<WH7725>: he shall even return, and have regard<WH995> unto them that forsake<WH5800> the holy<WH6944> covenant<WH1285>.

And forces<WH2220> shall stand<WH5975> on his part<WH2490>, and they shall profane the sanctuary<WH4720>, even the fortress<WH4581>, and shall take away<WH5493> the continual<WH8548> burnt-offering<WH5414>, and they shall set up the abomination<WH8251> that maketh desolate<WH8074>.

And such as do wickedly<WH7561> against the covenant<WH1285> shall he pervert<WH2610> by flatteries<WH2514>; but the people<WH5971> that know<WH3045> their God<WH430> shall be strong<WH2388>, and do exploits<WH6213>.

And they that are wise<WH7919> among the people<WH5971> shall instruct<WH995> many<WH7227>; yet they shall fall<WH3782> by the sword<WH2719> and by flame<WH3852>, by captivity<WH7628> and by spoil<WH961>, many days<WH3117>.
Now when they shall fall<WH3782>, they shall be helped<WH5826> with a little<WH4592> help<WH5828>; but many<WH7227> shall join<WH3867> themselves unto them with flatteries<WH2519>.

And some of them that are wise<WH7919> shall fall<WH3782>, to refine<WH6884> them<WH1305>, and to purify, and to make them white<WH3835>, even to the time<WH6256> of the end<WH7093>; because it is yet for the time appointed<WH4150>.

And the king<WH4428> shall do<WH6213> according to his will<WH7522>; and he shall exalt<WH7311> himself<WH1431>, and magnify himself above every god<WH410>, and shall speak<WH1696> marvellous things<WH6381> against the God<WH410> of gods<WH410>; and he shall prosper<WH6743> till the indignation<WH2195> be accomplished<WH3615>; for that which is determined<WH2782> shall be done<WH6213>.
Neither shall he regard<WH995> the gods<WH430> of his fathers<WH1>, nor the desire<WH2532> of women<WH802>, nor regard<WH995> any god<WH433>; for he shall magnify himself above all<WH1431>.

But in his place<WH3653> shall he honor<WH3513> the god<WH433> of fortresses<WH4581>; and a god<WH433> whom his fathers<WH1> knew<WH3045> not shall he honor<WH3513> with gold<WH2091>, and silver<WH3701>, and with precious<WH3368> stones<WH68>, and pleasant things<WH2532>.

And he shall deal<WH6213> with the strongest<WH4581> fortresses<WH4013> by the help of a foreign<WH5236> god<WH433>: whosoever acknowledgeth<WH5234> him he will increase<WH7235> with glory<WH3519>; and he shall cause them to rule<WH4910> over many<WH7227>, and shall divide<WH2505> the land<WH127> for a price<WH4242>.

And at the time<WH6256> of the end<WH7093> shall the king<WH4428> of the south<WH5045> contend<WH5055> with him<WH4428>; and the king of the north<WH6828> shall come against him like a whirlwind<WH8175>, with chariots<WH7393>, and with horsemen<WH6571>, and with many<WH7227> ships<WH591>; and he shall enter<WH935> into the countries<WH776>, and shall overflow<WH7857> and pass through<WH5674>.

He shall enter<WH935> also into the glorious<WH6643> land<WH776>, and many<WH7227> countries shall be overthrown<WH3782>; but these shall be delivered<WH4422> out of his hand<WH3027>: Edom<WH123>, and Moab<WH4124>, and the chief<WH7225> of the children<WH1121> of Ammon<WH5983>.
He shall stretch forth<WH7971> his hand<WH3027> also upon the countries<WH776>; and the land<WH776> of Egypt<WH4714> shall not escape<WH6413>.

But he shall have power<WH4910> over the treasures<WH4362> of gold<WH2091> and of silver<WH3701>, and over all the precious<WH2532> things of Egypt<WH4714>; and the Libyans<WH3864> and the Ethiopians<WH3569> shall be at his steps<WH4703>.

But tidings<WH8052> out of the east<WH4217> and out of the north<WH6828> shall trouble<WH926> him<WH3318>; and he shall go forth with great<WH1419> fury<WH2534> to destroy<WH8045> and utterly to sweep away<WH2763> many<WH7227>.

And he shall plant<WH5193> the tents<WH168> of his palace<WH643> between the sea<WH3220> and the glorious<WH6643> holy<WH6944> mountain<WH2022>; yet he shall come<WH935> to his end<WH7093>, and none shall help him<WH5826>.
